title: Microsoft will reportedly introduce an Xbox Game Pass Family Plan this year
content:
Microsoft is reportedly planning to introduce a new Family Plan for its Xbox Game Pass subscription service, which will give users the option to share access across devices in the same household. Although the company has not shared any details about the Family Plan so far, sources familiar with Microsoft’s plans have revealed that the

The post Microsoft will reportedly introduce an Xbox Game Pass Family Plan this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is reportedly planning to introduce a new Family Plan for its Xbox Game Pass subscription service. Read on to learn more.
